metadata.title: CVE-2018-17237 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the function H5D__chunk_set_info_real() ofH5Dchunk.c in the HDF HDF5 1.10.3 library during an attempted parse of acrafted HDF file, because of incorrect protection against division by zero.This issue is different from CVE-2018-11207.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
